isis.stitle: TSI 95-09-02 - Cab Air Ride Hood Wear Plate

subjectgroup.subject: Cab Air Ride Hood Wear Plate

geninfo.para: 8000 Series vehicles built between March 3, 1993 and July 31, 1995, with the cab air ride option may have the cab air ride hood wear plate on the inside of the hood installed incorrectly. This will allow excessive wear to occur to the inside of the hood. Figure 1 shows the plate installed incorrectly; Figure 2 shows it installed correctly. The wear plate should ride against the white nylon block mounted on top of the cowl.
This letter explains how to remove and re-install a wear plate that is incorrectly installed.

caution.para: While drilling out rivets or into the fiberglass material of the hood, care should be taken not to drill through the outer skin of the hood. A drill bit stop should be used.

step1.para: Inspect inside of hood for proper installation of the wear plate. If incorrectly installed, do the following:
Drill out six aluminum pop rivets that secure the wear plate to the hood ( Figure 1). Refer to Caution. Remove wear plate.
Position wear plate as shown in Figure 2.
Secure wear plate to four existing holes ( Figure 2) with 3/16" dia. x 3/4" long pop rivets.
Use the two remaining holes in the wear plate as templates to drill 3/16" dia. holes into the inner hood. Refer to Caution.
Install 3/16" dia. x 3/4" long pop rivets in these two holes ( Figure 2).
